OMG-This is the Biggest piece of Junk Ever. To start with: It looks like a CAM, Looks like kids shot this . Don't waste your time.  All efforts are appreciated. You "Should Have Done Something Else". Of course if you have taste for "Crap" , Be My Guest.
The Ole Fart

I *very* rarely don't watch movies all the way through - but this shit was turned off after 15 minutes... and 10 of those minutes were just amazement it could be so bad. The script must have been written by 12-year olds and then they got drunk to do the filming.

But thanks to the uploader anyways.

Audio - 8
Video - 7
Cinematography - 5

I would only recommend this if you have nothing better to do.
As stated prior, it's a low budget film and in an attempt to amp it up they used way too many tricks from film school leaving the viewer with a feeling of field of vision zoomed way in.
Plot is decent though, Smiths get better towards the end.
cinematography probably isnt the word. I had three epeleptics fits during this movie and Im just the camera man. Could have been a good movie if somebody else made it . WASTE

Acting sucked, plot sucked, directing sucked.. Well, basically everything sucked in this movie.

Don't waste your time.
Thanks for the upload been looking for this movie for over a year now
